price: Kemudian, mereka mendustakan Syuʻayb, lalu mereka ditimpa azab pada hari mereka dinaungi awan. Sesungguhnya azab itu adalah azab hari yang besar.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٍ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhahum ʿadhābu yawmi al-ẓulati innahu kāna ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
